name: LUPUS
description:
Sometimes you have to leave your home land not on your own. Your main character is Grey, wolf, who, as a result of chaotic events, finds himself in the mysterious world of Lupus. It would seem that a free vacation, but not everything is as smooth as it seems. Will Grey be able to return home, use the help of a local researcher, and also find out what really happened that day? Scenario, directing - PascalOz
Character Portraits - Horie
Backgrounds - neon burrito
Music - Yardood This is just a pilot version of the novel. If we get enough ratings and downloads, we will definitely try to release a full version!
